allow: Bash(psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "BEGIN; \i prisma/migrations/20251120191834_advancedmd_integration/migration.sql SELECT ''Migration test successful'' AS status; ROLLBACK;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='MentalSpace2024!SecurePwd' psql -h mentalspace-ehr-prod.ci16iwey2cac.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U mentalspace_admin -d mentalspace_ehr -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''users'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='MentalSpace2024!SecurePwd' psql -h mentalspace-ehr-prod.ci16iwey2cac.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U mentalspace_admin -d mentalspace_ehr -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_name LIKE ''%ai%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%AI%'' ORDER BY table_name;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='MentalSpace2024!SecurePwd' psql -h mentalspace-ehr-prod.ci16iwey2cac.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U mentalspace_admin -d mentalspace_ehr -c "SELECT pa.email, c.""firstName"", c.""lastName"" FROM ""PortalAccount"" pa JOIN ""Client"" c ON c.id = pa.""clientId"" WHERE c.""firstName"" = ''Tracy'' AND c.""lastName"" = ''Johnson'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='MentalSpace2024!SecurePwd' psql -h mentalspace-ehr-prod.ci16iwey2cac.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U mentalspace_admin -d mentalspace_ehr -c "SELECT c.id, c.""firstName"", c.""lastName"", c.""medicalRecordNumber"", pa.id as portal_account_id FROM ""Client"" c JOIN ""PortalAccount"" pa ON pa.""clientId"" = c.id WHERE c.""firstName"" = ''Tracy'' AND c.""lastName"" = ''Johnson'' LIMIT 1;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='MentalSpace2024!SecurePwd' psql -h mentalspace-ehr-prod.ci16iwey2cac.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U mentalspace_admin -d mentalspace_ehr -c "SELECT email, ""userRole"" FROM users WHERE ""userRole"" IN \(''ADMINISTRATOR'', ''SUPER_ADMIN''\) LIMIT 5;")
